<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Portfolio
</h1>

Creative personal & portfolio template based on a [Gatsby template](https://github.com/AbdaliDahir/gatsby-portfolio.git).

## ðŸ›  Features

- [Gatsby v2](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/)
- Uses styled-components + styled-system for styling
- SEO
- Responsive design
- Icons from [featherIcons](https://feathericons.com/)
- [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com) Deployment Friendly
- fetching data from the official GitHub [gatsby-source-github-api](https://github.com/ldd/gatsby-source-github-api)
- Google Analytics integration
- Easy site customization
